nodes.text: Star Wars Vol. 5: Yoda's Secret War

Star Wars Vol. 5: Yoda's Secret War is a canon trade paperback that collects issues 26–30 of the comic-book series Star Wars from author Jason Aaron, as well as Star Wars Annual 2 from author Kelly Thompson. It was published by Marvel Comics on July 18, 2017.
With one member of the rebel crew captured and imprisoned, we turn once more to the journals of Ben Kenobi and a legendary adventure with Jedi Master...Yoda!
